00009     {

00059     public enum Tiny_Type : byte
00060     {
00061         TINY_NONE,              //  0                                   : see "maintaining the connection"
00062         TINY_VER,               //  1 - info request    : get version
00063         TINY_CLOSE,             //  2 - instruction             : close insim
00064         TINY_PING,              //  3 - ping request    : external progam requesting a reply
00065         TINY_REPLY,             //  4 - ping reply              : reply to a ping request
00066         TINY_VTC,               //  5 - info                    : vote cancelled
00067         TINY_SCP,               //  6 - info request    : send camera pos
00068         TINY_SST,               //  7 - info request    : send state info
00069         TINY_GTH,               //  8 - info request    : get time in hundredths (i.e. SMALL_RTP)
00070         TINY_MPE,               //  9 - info                    : multi player end
00071         TINY_ISM,               // 10 - info request    : get multiplayer info (i.e. ISP_ISM)
00072         TINY_REN,               // 11 - info                    : race end (return to game setup screen)
00073         TINY_CLR,               // 12 - info                    : all players cleared from race
00074         TINY_NCN,               // 13 - info                    : get all connections
00075         TINY_NPL,               // 14 - info                    : get all players
00076         TINY_RES,               // 15 - info                    : get all results
00077         TINY_NLP,               // 16 - info request    : send an IS_NLP
00078         TINY_MCI,               // 17 - info request    : send an IS_MCI
00079         TINY_REO,               // 18 - info request    : send an IS_REO
00080         TINY_RST,               // 19 - info request    : send an IS_RST
00081         TINY_AXI,               // 20 - info request    : send an IS_AXI
00082         TINY_AXC,               // 21 - info                    : autocross cleared
00083     }
